title: Define Functional Database Query Language Requirements
description: Gather and document requirements for the new FunctionalDatabaseQueryLanguage, focusing on user needs, functional programming concepts, query performance, and compatibility with existing databases.

title: Design Functional Database Query Language Syntax
description: Design a syntax for the new query language that embraces functional programming concepts and is intuitive for developers.
dependencies: Define Functional Database Query Language Requirements

title: Implement Core Features of Functional Database Query Language
description: Develop the core features of the new query language, such as filtering, sorting, grouping, aggregating, and joining.
dependencies: Design Functional Database Query Language Syntax

title: Create a Test Suite for Functional Database Query Language
description: Write test cases and implement a testing suite to ensure the correctness of the implemented features.
dependencies: Implement Core Features of Functional Database Query Language

title: Optimize Performance of Functional Database Query Language
description: Identify and optimize performance bottlenecks in the new query language to ensure efficient execution of complex queries.
dependencies: Implement Core Features of Functional Database Query Language

title: Document Functional Database Query Language Design and Implementation
description: Create detailed documentation for the new query language, including design decisions, implementation details, and usage examples.
dependencies: Implement Core Features of Functional Database Query Language

title: Integrate Functional Database Query Language into Existing Database Systems
description: Modify existing database systems to support the new query language.
dependencies: Implement Core Features of Functional Database Query Language
Create a Test Suite for Functional Database Query Language
